name: Mom's Adventure: Baby Mermaid
description:
Help our mermaid Arielle in her most important pregnancy day to give birth to her little baby in the ocean in this free pregnancy game for girls!

Nine months waiting and today is the big pregnancy day: The day our mermaid Arielle gives birth! Hurry up and get ready to go to the hospital in the ocean!

Let's start this funny pregnancy journey with our mermaid: Tidy up your room and leave it clean for your baby who is about to come! Do not forget to baby-sit and clean Arielle's little fish!

Learn to prepare the correct food and drink for the mermaid's pregnancy in order to make her baby stronger and healthier and do not go to the hospital before entering at the underwater pharmacy to run a medical check before she makes the medical pregnancy tests at the hospital.

This educational pregnancy game for free is full of adventure, puzzles and different mini games related with pregnancy and baby care to have more fun!

- Enjoy many different mini games inside this mermaid's pregnancy simulator!
- Help our mermaid Arielle to give birth to her little baby!
- Learn about maternity, baby care and mermaid's pregnancy in the ocean!
- Newborn baby care games for girls with simple and intuitive gameplay!

Play with our mermaid and learn everything about mermaid's pregnancy for free!
